name: racers.p8
description:
I started this prototype in late 2019, then worked for it for a number of months into 2020. Unfortunately, it fell by the wayside, mainly because it's quite complex to get the performance profile right. (A 60FPS top-down racer with physics is an interesting challenge!)

For now I thought I would put a demo version onto Itch, with one playable track, and see if I feel encouraged to complete the full version. If you like it then please find me on Twitter @btsherratt and let me know.
